item.description: Pattaya and Bangkok itinerary Day 1 Afternoon we reached Bangkok and transferred to Pattaya (takes 2 hours) In Pattaya, checked in and refreshed and went to Bali Hai Pier for a free New Year event party From Bali Hai Pier, walked all the way to the Walking Street of Pattaya and explored Took a leg message before returning to the hotel

Networking All container/PODs can communicate to other without NAT all nodes can communicate to containers and vice versa without NAT network is expected to be set up by k9s to connect communication between different groups of pods !
